ComicInfo.Summary:
Leonardo and Splinter plan for the coming war with Shredder. As they meditate on what their true path must be, they are engulfed by darkness. And from that darkness emergesâ€¦ the Rat King! Will his meddling with their minds lead to salvation or madness?
